title: 求教工业mod怎么改配置
txt_content: 求教工业mod，怎么改核爆范围和核弹爆炸范围。

replies.author: nuo13260
replies.txt_content:
改：config里面的IC2.ini
[protection]
; Enable logging of players when they remove a machine using a wrench.
wrenchLogging = true
; Maximum Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4.  TNT范围为4
nukeExplosionPowerLimit = 1   1为自毁
; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.   TNT范围为4
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 1   1为自毁
; Enable the nuke
enableNuke = true复制代码
